list.p:
Arkiiva
Beavdegirjjit
Doaibmaplánat
Doaibmamuitalusat
Almmuhuheamit ja earát

body.p: Registrere epoastačujuhusa vuostáiváldit ođasreivve ja dieđu go giinu cealká.
Ohcejoga gielddas ásse jahkemolsumis 2009/10 oktiibuot 1302 olbmo. Olmmošlohku lea stáđđásit geahppánan 1995 rájes go gielddas ásse 1568 olbmo.

1995 rájes lea olmmošlohku geahppánan 266 olbmuin Álbmotregistara aiddo almmuhuvvon dieđuid mielde. Álbmotregistaris boahtá maid ovdan leago olbmo eatnigiellan almmuhuvvon sámegiella, suomagiella, ruoŧagiella dahje eará giella. Danne sáhttá maid oaidnit giellajoavkkuid gaskasaš erohusaid Ohcejogas, ja daid nuppástusaid.

Mannan jahkemolsumis 662 ássi ledje merken suomagiela eatnigiellan Álbmotregistarii, 611 olbmo sámegiela eatnigiellan, golmmas ruoŧagiela ja 26:s eará gielaid. 27 olbmo leat olgoriikka stáhtalahtut, gieldda eará ássit Suoma stáhtalahtut.
Sámegielagat ledje eanetlogus Ohcejogas 1994 rádjái, ja eanemus sámegielagat ledje registaris jagi 1985. Dalle ledje 833 olbmo almmuhan sámegiela eatnigiellan.
Jagi 1995 ledje Ohcejogas eanemus suomagielat ássit goassege – oktiibuot 787 ja 775 sámegielaga. Dan rájes lea sihke sámegielat ja suomagielat ássiid lohku geahppánan.

Muhtin dieđut Álbmotregistaris čujuhit dasa ahte sámegiela giellamolsun Ohcejogas leat bisánan. Jagi 2003 rádjái geahppánii sámegielagiid oassi olmmošlogus jagis jahkái. 2003 rájes lea sámegielagiid lohku bisson sullii seammá dásis. 2003:s ledje 616 sámegielaga ja 2009/10 jahkemolsumis 611. Seammá áigodagas lea suomagielagiid lohku geahppánan 87 olbmuin. 2003 ledje 749 suomagielaga registaris, ja 2009/10 ledje 662.

Ii galgga daid loguid áddet nu ahte Ohcejogas leat dál dušše 611 sámegiela hálli, dahje dušše 662 suomagiela hálli. Ii leat vejolaš merket eanetgo ovtta eatnigiela, ja leatge ollu ássit geat máhttet sámegiela vaikko eai leat merken sámegiela eatnigiellan.

You are welcome! So glad to be of help. I, too, have aothurs I go to to figure out how to do stuff. But how cool to be of help to someone else!Not sure what advice I can give other than what is in the books but...trying to make the scenes in the past topical to the present helps (it"s hard...but it"s a good idea if you can do it.;-)Also, I give all credit to my husband (author John C. Wright) as he invented the rest of Miranda"s family and made them seem real to me. Nice writing stuff on your blog!Jagi

I’ve never seen the appeal of the cowl, and I still do78;&21n#t – but if I did, I’d definitely make this one – it is such a pretty pattern and it looks great in the red, a lovely flash of colour. And probably a lot easier to wear for a mum of 4 boys than a shawl in any event!

Conor - I think the shoe rides great on the road. I can't say that it wears very well, though, because we deliberately put a softer, stickier rubber on the outsole than what was on the 101s (which was quite hard and slick). I do a lot of moderate scrambling on my mountain runs and the softer rubber gives me extra troecian/scturity on rock. The trade-off, however, is that it's not quite as durable.
